1.text: The LORD reigneth, he is clothed with majesty; the LORD is clothed with strength, wherewith he hath girded himself: the world also is stablished, that it cannot be moved.

2.text: Thy throne is established of old: thou art from everlasting.

3.text: The floods have lifted up, O LORD, the floods have lifted up their voice; the floods lift up their waves.

4.text: The LORD on high is mightier than the noise of many waters, yea, than the mighty waves of the sea.

5.text: Thy testimonies are very sure: holiness becometh thine house, O LORD, for ever.
